boardgame.name: Carcassonne da viaggio
Carcassonne de voyage
Carcassonne: Reiseditie
Reise-Carcassonne
Travel Carcassonne
boardgame.description: Reise-Carcassonne is, as the name says, a Travel Edition of Carcassonne. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rules of the game are (mostly) the same, but there are some changes between the two editions: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No Expansions: The tiles size of the Travel Edition is smaller than the regular game, so it is not possible to add any expansion for the regular game. EXCEPT The Phantom expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Le Sac as counting table: The game includes a bag for the tiles that is printed with a counting table. (Le Sac is missing from the 2012 reprint edition, which instead comes with a counting table printed on the back of the box.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Third Edition farm scoring: The Rio Grande edition features, for the first time, the current, Third Edition Hans im Glück farm scoring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Belongs to the Carcassonne series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: Dutch second edition with scoretrack on the box

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

still sealed
new copy, outside box is a little crunched (shipped that way to me), all components are stored in the bag anyway.

999 Games - Carcassonne Reiseditie Language: Dutch Players: 2 to 5 Age: 10+ Duration: 30 to 45 min Weight: 0.395 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: The Travel Edition of Carcassonne. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Reise-Carcassonne Publisher: Hans im Glück Verlag (2007) Language: de/fr/it Condition: excellent, played once and therefore punched but like new in every other aspect. Complete, no damages, no wear and tear.
No box, but like you wanted the box for a travel game in the first place.
new, but without cardboard box

Rio Grande Games (RIO327F) Now you can take Carcassonne everywhere you go. The scoring track is printed on the cloth carrying sack, which has room for all the tiles and followers. Of course, all components are a bit downsized to make it more convenient to carry along, but the game is the same great game that won the Spiel des Jahres award in 2001!

Does not include original box. (Does include cloth pouch/score track.)
